Platforma NFT Trader a reusit sa recupereze NFT-urile furate pe 16 Decembrie cu un bounty de 267K $. Printre NFT-urile furate initial erau cateva Bored Ape Yacht Club si Mutant Ape Yacht Club, iar valoarea lor era estimata la aproximativ 3 milioane de dolari.

NFT #Markets Stable After Recovery from #NFT Trader Hack! Bored Ape Yacht Club and Mutant Ape Yacht Club #NFTs returned; Nansen's NFT-500 and Blue-Chip-10 indices show minimal impact. #NFTSecurity #MarketStability #HackRecovery
Major NFT Indices Stable After NFT Trader Hack Bored Ape Yacht Club and Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFTs were returned to their owners after Yuga Labs' Greg Solano and Boring Security DAO paid a bounty.

Hackers managed to steal millions of dollars on valuable NFTs, including Bored Ape Yacht Club and Mutant Ape Yacht Club, using the NFT Trader exploit. Following the hacking of the "old smart contracts," NFT Trader has called on users to revoke access to the two compromised…

All Bored Ape Yacht Club #BAYC and Mutant Ape Yacht Club #MAYC non-fungible tokens #NFTs that were stolen from the peer-to-peer trading platform #NFT Trader have been returned, After the hacker receiving 120 $ETH Bounty. #Mantle $MNT $XRP #Dfinity $ICP #XDeFi $XDEFI #ebeking19

Following the hack targeting NFT Trader, major NFT indices have remained stable. The stolen Bored Ape Yacht Club and Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFTs have been successfully returned to their respective owners. Yuga Labs' Greg Solano and Boring Security DAO facilitated the return by…
NFT Trader was hacked through its old smart contracts, resulting in hacking stealing high-value NFTs, including Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins and Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFTs.
